DOC.brief_title: Diabetes Prevention Among Post-partum Women With History Gestational Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: The STAR-MAMA intervention build theoretical construct find Social Cognitive Theory , Theory Planned Behavior , Theories Social Support find effective weight loss , physical activity dietary change , base recent meta-analysis study . The investigator propose development STAR-MAMA incorporate specific behavior change technique associated theory , include : `` self-regulatory '' intervention technique ( specific goal setting , prompt self-monitoring , provide feedback performance , goal review ) , self-efficacy building intervention technique ( motivational interviewing , use decisional balance relapse prevention ) , individual tailoring technique ( information content resource ) , culturally tailor social support , incorporate family need .
